string.name: module_desc
string.value: 花粉浓度预报应用模块

string.name: EntryAbility_desc
string.value: 基于鸿蒙生态的智能花粉过敏管理平台

string.name: internet_permission_reason
string.value: 需要访问网络以获取花粉浓度数据和天气信息

string.name: location_permission_reason
string.value: 需要获取您的位置以显示当地花粉浓度数据

string.name: network_info_permission_reason
string.value: 需要检测网络状态以加载地图和数据

string.name: notification_permission_reason
string.value: 需要发送花粉预警和每日播报通知

string.name: publish_reminder_permission_reason
string.value: 需要设置定时提醒以推送每日花粉播报

string.name: detect_gesture_permission_reason
string.value: 需要检测握持姿势以优化单手操作体验

string.name: manage_sensor_permission_reason
string.value: 需要管理传感器权限以实现智感握姿检测

string.name: widget_description
string.value: 显示当前花粉浓度和风险等级

string.name: daily_report_task_desc
string.value: 每日播报后台任务，用于定时发送花粉浓度提醒

string.name: background_permission_reason
string.value: 需要后台运行权限以在应用关闭后定时发送花粉提醒

string.name: reminder_permission_reason
string.value: 需要代理提醒权限以设置每日花粉浓度定时提醒
